title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin has bad news for the Chiefs after their loss to the Bills and why we were too quick to anoint them as a never ending dynasty in today's NFL. He explains why he's buying into the Dallas Cowboys as a legitimate Super Bowl contender this season. He also tells you why he was right about Baker Mayfield and wrong about Ezekiel Elliott. Plus, hall of famer and Fox Sports NFL analyst Howie Long joins the show to discuss Justin Herbert's rise and where he stands among the top QBs in the league.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
